channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Prompting Company snags $6.5M to help products get mentioned in ChatGPT and other AI apps
item.description: People are increasingly asking AI, not Google, to help them discover products. A recent shopping report says Americans, this holiday season, will like...

item.title: IntrCity SmartBus lands $30M at $140M valuation to deepen its grip on India’s intercity travel market
item.description: IntrCity SmartBus grew revenue by 67% last year and is targeting full profitability this year, as intercity travel booms across India.

item.title: IntrCity SmartBus lands $30M at $140M valuation to deepen its grip on India’s intercity travel market
item.description: IntrCity SmartBus grew revenue by 67% last year and is targeting full profitability this year, as intercity travel booms across India.

item.title: How K-Pop Demon Hunters Star EJAE Topped the Charts
item.description: Kids everywhere know her voice—if not her name. WIRED talks to the former SM trainee about her rise to global superstardom with her hit song “Golden.”

item.title: Figma acquires AI-powered media generation company Weavy
item.description: Figma said today that it has acquired AI-powered image and video generation company Weavy.

item.title: WhatsApp adds passkey protection to end-to-end encrypted backups
item.description: WhatsApp is enabling users to encrypt their backup using passkeys

item.title: Google partners with Ambani’s Reliance to offer free AI Pro access to millions of Jio users in India
item.description: The offer will first roll out to Jio users aged 18 to 25 before expanding to all subscribers nationwide.

item.title: KitchenAid Promo Code: 25% Off in November 2025
item.description: Save on every purchase with top KitchenAid coupons from WIRED, including up to 25% off countertop appliances.

item.title: Federal Workers Are Barely Making It Through the Government Shutdown
item.description: The US government shut down 30 days ago. WIRED spoke with more than a dozen federal workers who have struggled to pay bills, worked side gigs, and rel...

item.title: Lenovo Coupon Codes and Deals: $5,000+ Off
item.description: Whether you’re shopping for a ThinkPad, Yoga laptop, or Legion gaming PC, these Lenovo discount codes and promotions can help you save big on your nex...
